loan.name: Fatima Lourdes
loan.use: to buy farming supplies for her crops such as seeds, compost, fertilizers, and poisons.
loan.description:
Fátima is 23 years old and studied through the ninth grade. She is in a relationship with her partner who works in agriculture. They have a daughter who is a dependent.

From a very young age, Fátima has worked in agriculture. She plants basic grains with her partner between the hours of 6:00 A.M. and 11:00 A.M. In addition, she takes care of the household duties. She also has experience raising and selling cattle.

Fátima needs a loan to buy farming supplies for her crops such as seeds, compost, fertilizers, and poisons. She dreams of building a house.
loan.whySpecial: It enables farmers to plant basic grains to feed their families.
